references: N. J. A. Sloane, A Handbook of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1973 (includes this sequence).
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..22
prog: (Haskell)a001064 n = a001064_list !! na001064_list = 1 : 1 : 0 : zipWith (+) a001064_list   (tail $ zipWith (*) a001064_list (tail a001064_list))-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Dec 30 2011
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, _R. K. Guy_
